entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
